sections.title: About Sepia Filter
content: Sepia tone creates a warm, brownish tint that mimics the look of antique photographs. Perfect for vintage aesthetics and nostalgic effects.

sections.title: What is Sepia Tone?
content: Warm brown tint reminiscent of old photographs
Originally a chemical process in film photography
Adds warmth and emotional depth to images
Popular for portraits and historical themes

sections.title: Best Uses
content: Social media posts with nostalgic themes
